comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The Deutsches Turnfest (German gymnastics festival, literally) was held in Leipzig 12-16 July 1913: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deutsches_Turnfest

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: Date reads July 31, 1913 (7/31/13). As Wystan points out, it looks like a picture of a picture.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Thanks for pointing out the date.  We'll add it to the record next time we update.
